scripts.start-api: dotenv -- node scripts/config-setup.js && cd .temp_custom_deps && npm install && cd .. && cross-env MIMIR_CFG_PATH=$INIT_CWD/.temp_custom_deps npm run internalStartApi
scripts.start-cli: dotenv -- node scripts/config-setup.js && cd .temp_custom_deps && npm install && cd .. && cross-env MIMIR_CFG_PATH=$INIT_CWD/.temp_custom_deps npm run internalStart
scripts.start-discord: dotenv -- node scripts/config-setup.js && cd .temp_custom_deps && npm install && cd .. && cross-env MIMIR_CFG_PATH=$INIT_CWD/.temp_custom_deps npm run internalStartDiscordNoBuild
scripts.start-lg: npm run build && dotenv -- npm run start -w lg-server
scripts.internalStartApi: npm run build -w agent-mimir-api-contracts && npm run build -w agent-mimir-runtime-shared && npm run build -w agent-mimir-api-server && dotenv -- npm run start -w agent-mimir-api-server
scripts.internalStartDiscord: npm run build && dotenv -- npm run start -w agent-mimir-discord
scripts.publish: bash scripts/release-branch.sh && turbo run build lint && npm run release -w agent-mimir && echo 'ðŸ”— Open https://github.com/Altaflux/agent-mimir/compare/release?expand=1 and merge the release PR'
scripts.start-web: dotenv -- node scripts/config-setup.js && cd .temp_custom_deps && npm install && cd .. && cross-env MIMIR_CFG_PATH=$INIT_CWD/.temp_custom_deps MIMIR_PUBLIC_API_BASE_PATH=/api dotenv -- npm run internalStartWeb
scripts.start-web-dev: dotenv -- node scripts/config-setup.js && cd .temp_custom_deps && npm install && cd .. && cross-env MIMIR_CFG_PATH=$INIT_CWD/.temp_custom_deps MIMIR_PUBLIC_API_BASE_PATH=/api dotenv -- npm run internalStartWebNoBuild
scripts.internalStartWeb: npm run build && turbo run start --only --env-mode=loose --filter=agent-mimir-api-server --filter=agent-mimir-web
scripts.internalStartWebNoBuild: npm run build -w agent-mimir-api-contracts && npm run build -w agent-mimir-runtime-shared && npm run build -w agent-mimir-api-server && turbo run dev --env-mode=loose --filter=agent-mimir-api-server --filter=agent-mimir-web
